hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu 'Uthman, who was not Al-Hindi, that:Umm Al-Fadl sent word to Anas bin Malik, asking him about Nabidh made in an earthenware jar. He told her about his son An-Nadr, who used to make Nabidh in an earthenware jar in the morning and drink it in the evening

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَجُوزُ شُرْبُهُ مِنَ الأَنْبِذَةِ وَمَا لاَ يَجُوزُ
chapter.eng-name: Kinds of Nabidh that are Permissible to Drink and the Kinds that are Not
